item.title: Childcare, parental investment, demography and diversity
item.description: Status: Ongoing Collaborators: Anushé Hassan (LSHTM), Sylvain Viguier (Graphcore, London), Mark Dyble (UCL), Daniel Smith (Bristol), Andrea Migliano (Zürich), Emily Emmott (UCL), Nikhil Chaudhary (Cambridge), Sarah Myers (UCL & MPI), Susie Lee (MPI), Rebecca Sear (LSHTM) Funding: Medical Research Council ​ Non-maternal carers (allomothers) are hypothesized to lighten the mother’s workload, allowing for the specialized human life history including relatively short interbirth intervals and multiple dependent offspring.
